data.title: Washington D.C.: Witness an Washington Nationals Major League Baseball Game at Nationals Park
data.text: Batter up! Catch the Washington Nationals in action at Nationals Park and witness America’s favourite pastime: Major League Baseball! Immerse yourself in an iconic baseball experience, feel the buzzing energy of the crowd and witness the thrilling action that unfolds on the diamond. Not only is Nationals Park the home of the Washington Nationals, but is seen as a spiritual home to the people of Washington D.C.. Get the full experience the game live by wearing the team’s colours and heading in early to the ground or nearby bars. Grab a game day bite before taking your seat to see the ceremonial first pitch and witness the baseball legends do what they do best!
